Future Dreams

Silver Years

Ishu, my love, in years to come,
When silver crowns our days of sun.
Still hand in hand, hearts young and free,
Just as beautiful as you'll always be.

Our Home

A house we'll build with love and care,
Every dream of yours I'll share.
Ishu's touch in every room,
Where our happiness will bloom.

Garden Dreams

We'll plant roses side by side,
Watch them bloom with loving pride.
Ishu tending flowers rare,
Building dreams that we will share.

Morning Promise

Each dawn I'll bring you coffee warm,
Keep you safe from every storm.
Ishu's smile my daily light,
Making every moment bright.

Travel Tales

Hand in hand through foreign lands,
Walking on distant golden sands.
Ishu's wonder at each sight,
Adventures shared in pure delight.

Cozy Winters

By firelight in winters deep,
Holding you as snowflakes leap.
Ishu wrapped in warm embrace,
Time stands still in this sweet space.

Family Joy

Little footsteps, laughter sweet,
Making our joy so complete.
Ishu's love in children's eyes,
Future filled with paradise.

Anniversary Dreams

Year by year our love grows strong,
Like a never-ending song.
Celebrating Ishu's grace,
In every time and every place.

Sunset Years

Growing old but young at heart,
Never shall our souls depart.
Ishu's beauty never fades,
Through life's brightest promenades.

Forever Promise

In this life and next to come,
Two hearts beating soft as one.
Ishu, my eternal light,
Making every future bright.
